segments.text: Hello , John , please invite all our clients to the conference next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How should I get their contact info .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Get the clients ' contact info from my Rolodex .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where should I put them up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The clients like the Shangri-La Hotel more .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , the client is always right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What else would I prepare , Sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please print out the meeting agenda for me to look over .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And make sure to return my Rolodex to my desk when you are done with it .
segments.speaker: S1
